i.name: Surging Tides
i.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

q.name: Aqua Prison
q.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

w.name: Ebb and Flow
w.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.

e.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
e.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.

r.name: Tidal Wave
r.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

i1.blurb: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} All allied [[champion]]s touched by any of '''Nami's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] gain {{sti|ms|{{as|60|ms}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds,{{ft|doubled|{{as|120|ms}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}} when touched by {{ai|Tidal Wave|Nami}}.
i1.name: Surging Tides
notes: * ''Surging Tides'' will apply when an ally champion is targeted by {{ai|Ebb and Flow|Nami}} / {{ai|Tidecaller's Blessing|Nami}} or when within {{ai|Aqua Prison|Nami}} / {{ais|Tidal Wave|Nami}} impact area.

riot.name: Surging Tides
riot.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

riot.name: Aqua Prison
riot.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
riot.tooltip: Sends a bubble to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

q1.blurb: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nami''' sends a bubble towards the targeted area, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies hit, {{tip|sight|revealing}} them, and {{tip|suspension|suspending}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
q1.name: Aqua Prison
notes: * ''Aqua Prison'' counts as a knockup for enabling {{ai|Last Breath|Yasuo}}.<ref>[http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1s0gkx/were_the_yasuo_team_ama/cdsp1op Yasuo Reddit AMA]</ref>
* Cast time makes ''Aqua Prison'' take ~{{fd|0.875}} seconds from casting to landing regardless of distance.

** Since the area of effect has a ~162 units radius, an enemy unit with {{fd|185.14}} or less movement speed (325 affected by a {{fd|53.8}}% slow, due to the low-end movement speed soft cap) would find it impossible to escape.

*** As a result it might be necessary to have another source of crowd control in order for ''Aqua Prison'' to land. A fully-ranked {{ai|Tidecaller's Blessing|Nami}} powered by {{as|376 AP}} would be able to slow for the amount above, alhough it is unlikely an enemy has not purchased movement speed by that time.

riot.name: Ebb and Flow
riot.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

w1.blurb: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nami''' unleashes a stream of water onto the target champion or herself, which then bounces to nearby unaffected champions up to twice, alternating between enemies, allies and herself.
''Ebb and Flow'' {{tip|Heal|heals}} allies and deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies, with each bounce being 85% {{as|(+ {{fd|7.5%}} per 100 AP)}} as effective as the previous one.
w1.name: Ebb and Flow
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only one bounce. ''Ebb and Flow'' will continue to bounce and the target who blocked the ability may be targeted again by a later bounce.
* Additional [[ability power]] will modify the damage/healing of ''Ebb and Flow'' by a percentage, based on the number of bounces.
** At Rank 5 with {{as|0 AP}} (-15% per bounce) the first heal/damage will be 185/230, the second 157/196, and the third 130/161.
*** At Rank 5 with {{as|200 AP}} (no change per bounce) the heal/damage will be will remain at 245/330 throughout.
**** At Rank 5 with {{as|600 AP}} (+30% per bounce) the first heal/damage will be 365/530, the second 475/689, and the third 584/848.

riot.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
riot.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
riot.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks, causing them to slow the target by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} second and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage. Lasts for {{ e5 }} seconds.

e1.blurb: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nami''' blesses the target allied champion or herself for 6 seconds, causing her target's next three [[basic attack]]s to each deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|slow}} their target for 1 second.
e1.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
notes: * ''Tidecaller's Blessing'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Nami's'' previous orders.
* The enhanced attacks will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Tidecaller's Blessing's'' bonus damage.
* ''Tidecaller's Blessing'' has no effect against structures.
* ''Tidecaller's Blessing'' will not proc {{ii|Muramana}} more than once per auto attack.

* Both effects of ''Tidecaller's Blessing'' will be wasted if the attacks are {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, or if they {{tip|blind|miss}}.
* ''Tidecaller's Blessing's'' amount of on-hit damage dealt is based on ''Nami's'' own [[ability power]] on-cast.
** It's also based on the buffed ally's [[magic penetration]] rather than ''Nami's''.

riot.name: Tidal Wave
riot.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
riot.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of {{ e3 }} seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

r1.blurb: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nami''' summons a tidal wave that surges forth, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all units it hits, {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{tt|{{fd|0.5}}|Estimated}} seconds and then {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{pp|type=distance traveled|11|2|2.2|2.4|2.6|2.8|3|3.2|3.4|3.6|3.8|4|0|275|550|825|1100|1375|1650|1925|2200|2475|2750|formula=2 (+ <nowiki>{{fd|0.2}}</nowiki> per 275 units traveled). ''The duration increased is capped at 2750 units.''}} seconds.
r1.name: Tidal Wave
notes: * There is a brief channel time during which '''Nami''' performs the animation.
** It can only be interrupted by death in which case the ability will not trigger and will not go on cooldown.
* {{ai|Surging Tides|Nami}} will immediately trigger on Nami on cast.
* The wave travels for ~{{fd|3.2}} seconds at ~859 speed and the projectile is ~562 units wide.
** It is undodgeable by foot at 325 movement speed and 742 range.
* The wave places you slightly closer to her cast position.
